lot of college aged kids on facebook so all video games-most of ones i deal with are wii PS2 & 3 DS and the compact PS

i've often wondered why the library doesn't "update" - make it cooler to go there to read; surf the net; etc. coffee a definite
definitely need something on "gaming" too-it's so hot especially need to make people aware when you have a "deal"
i'd say top 20 items let people who buy those items write their own review good/bad/ course TRU would have to monitor
Special coupons definitely; new product releases; customer reviews of products; focus on all ages of children
